dmca.title: Complaint About "Page 3 Girls" Blogspot
dmca.body:
News International 

Google, Inc. 
ATTN: Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private]
CA 94043

27 October 2004

Dear Sir /Madam

1. I am writing from News International Ltd, the parent company of The Sun newspaper and owner of the Page3.com website. The copyright to all Page 3 images, whether in our newspaper, website (www.page3.com) or any other format is owned by News Group Newspapers Ltd. I believe this copyright to these Page 3 pictures has been infringed

2. The copyrighted work that has been infringed on http://page3girls.bogspot.com/ is set out below. On this link all 15 images that contain the Page3.com watermark belong to Page3.com. In addition these links also infringe our copyright: 
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?michelle.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?katie.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?nikkala.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?jak.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?michelle.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?anna.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?ruth.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?nadia.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?krystle.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004/10/page?3?girl?zoe.html

There are also archive links on the right hand side of the main page which infringe the copyright of Page3.com

http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2003_02_23_page3girls_archive.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004_08_29_page3girls_archive.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004_09_05_page3girls_archive.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004_09_12_page3girls_archive.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004_09_26_page3girls_archive.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004_10_03_page3girls_archive.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004_10_10_page3girls_archive.html
http://page3girls.blogspot.com/2004_10_17_page3girls_archive.html

3. Contact details:

[private]
Intellectual Property Manager
News  International Newspapers Lt 
[private]
London
B98 1SY

T 44 (0) xxx xxxxxxx
F 44 (0) xxx xxx xxxx

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the Law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Yours sincerely,

[private]
Intellectual Property Manager
News International Newspapers Ltd
[private]
London
E98 I SY

T 44 (0) XXX XXXXXXX
F 44 (0) XXX XXX XXXX
